header: TPCiSLC (The Perl Conference in Salt Lake City) has closed their CFP submission. If you have missed their deadline, then don't worry TPCiG (The Perl Conference in Glasgow) CFP is still open for you. If for some reason you can't go to Glasgow, then check out other Perl events in the newsletter.
